sentence.Network_en: He was watching her fixedly, willing her to look at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凝视着她，希望她也看他。

sentence.Network_en: She was aware that he was watching her fixedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她知道他正在盯着她看。

sentence.Network_en: I stared fixedly at the statue.
sentence.Network_cn: 我目不转睛地看着那尊雕像。

entry.tran: 目不转睛地;凝视良久地
entry.def: If you stare fixedly at someone or something, you look at them steadily and continuously for a period of time.

example.ex: I stared fixedly at the statue...
example.tran: 我目不转睛地看着那尊雕像。

example.tran: 她知道他正在盯着她看。
